input.sentences: three women pose for a photo at the dinner party .
a different group of people at the dinner party pose for a picture together .
four people of all ages group together for a photo opportunity .
there are many patrons at the dinner and it is a fancy occasion .
the table setting is perfect and there are decorations all around .
output.sentences: As the hired photographer, Bill first took a picture of the host with two guests.
He then snapped a shot of a group of friends who had just arrived.
Bill then returned to the host and took a picture of her showing the menu and agenda to new arrivals.
The host made sure Bill took another photo of her with the honored patrons.
As the dinner event started, Bill made sure to get a shot of the table setting before anyone moved a thing.
